page_context.purpose: Convert visitors into trial signups for a project management SaaS tool by showcasing key features and building trust through social proof

features.name: Hero Section
features.description: Eye-catching hero with value proposition headline, subheadline explaining the product, and primary CTA button for starting a free trial
user_stories: As a visitor, I want to immediately understand what the product does so I can decide if it's relevant to me
As a visitor, I want an easy way to start a trial without friction

features.name: Feature Highlights
features.description: Display 3-4 key product features with icons, titles, and brief descriptions to communicate core value
user_stories: As a visitor, I want to see the main features so I understand what problems the product solves

features.name: Social Proof
features.description: Show customer testimonials with photos, names, titles, and quotes to build trust and credibility
user_stories: As a visitor, I want to see that other companies use this product successfully

features.name: Pricing Preview
features.description: Brief pricing section showing starting price and link to full pricing page

features.name: Final CTA
features.description: Bottom section with compelling copy and signup form to capture leads who scrolled through the page

existing_patterns.name: Button
existing_patterns.usage: Primary and secondary button styles exist in the design system

existing_patterns.name: Card
existing_patterns.usage: Card component for feature cards and testimonial cards
